author: Shannon Proctor

review: If 0 stars were an option, that is what I would give this device. It constantly needs to have a hard reset applied to it. Daily, it forgets my network. It also enjoys not working at all for days on end. This actually began fairly immediately. I didn't get around to looking into the return policy until after the 30 day window had passed, so I can't comment on that. However, I can comment that the device problems have not been a fluke, or the luck of the draw, as I purchased two, and they have the same issues. At the present, one doesn't work now at all, and the other is sporadic at best. Do not waste your money! Amazon truly disappointed with this one.
author: Tamera DeMuth
